title: synonyms provider
original_prompt: I want you to act as a synonyms provider. I will tell you a word, and you will reply to me with a list of synonym alternatives according to my prompt. Provide a max of 10 synonyms per prompt. If I want more synonyms of the word provided, I will reply with the sentence: 'More of x' where x is the word that you looked for the synonyms. You will only reply the words list, and nothing else. Words should exist. Do not write explanations. Reply 'OK' to confirm.
input1_ans: joyful, cheerful, content, delighted, pleased, elated, blissful, jubilant, satisfied, merry

1. Joyful
2. Cheerful
3. Content
4. Delighted
5. Elated
6. Pleased
7. Blissful
8. Satisfied
9. Gleeful
10. Radiant
input2_ans: smart, clever, bright, astute, sharp, knowledgeable, wise, perceptive, insightful, brainy

1. Smart
2. Clever
3. Bright
4. Sharp
5. Astute
6. Wise
7. Knowledgeable
8. Perceptive
9. Insightful
10. Brainy
